name: Toy Breakers
description:
Fight your way to be king of the toy-box! Bring out the child inside as you battle other toys in forts of books and building blocks!

A simple but exciting little multiplayer fighting game themed around toys in a child's room.

★ Play against AI or friends!

★ Pick your champion; choose from four unique toys who fights for you!

★ Choose your arena; select one of two beautifully crafted environments!

★ Boost your way to the winner’s crown with a variety of exciting pick-ups!

*Note: This game is in BETA. If it is well received more player toys, environments and game options shall be added!

Violet Triad is a small team of five artists and developers studying at the University of Northampton. We formed our group as part of a group project module on our courses, and this game is the result!

If you have any queries regarding us or our game you can contact us at violettriad@gmail.com or you can find us individually via the links below!
